text: Deng Nan (; born October 1945 in Guang'an, Sichuan) is a Chinese politician and physicist. ==Personal life== Deng's university classmate Zhang Hong () was sent to the same commune in Ningqiang County, where the two frequently cooked food and collected firewood together. They are thought to have already been romantically involved at this point. The two later had a daughter in 1972 called Deng Zhuorui (), alternatively known as Mianmian (), known professionally as Ran (Anne) Zhuo ().Sometimes misspelt with the characters 棉棉. She married the CEO of Anbang Insurance Group, Wu Xiaohui in 2004. It was Wu's third marriage and they had one son. In 2014, Zhuorui ceased being a shareholder in two companies owned by Anbang, which was followed by news of the couple's separation in 2015. ==References== ===Notes=== ===Works cited=== * Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sichuan Category:Chinese communist politicians Category:21st-century Chinese politicians
title: Deng Nan
